intro.title: Welcome to Jokers of Neon
intro.content: Let's walk through the <1>basics</1> of the game.

pointsTarget.title: Beating a Level
pointsTarget.content: To beat a level, hit the <1>target score</1> by playing poker hands.

playableHand.step-1: Use the cards in your <1>hand</1> to make the best poker play.
playableHand.step-2: No poker hand? Use a <1>discard</1> to get new cards. Let's try it.
playableHand.pair: Great! A <1>PAIR</1> of 7s. Let's play it!
playableHand.secondPair: Nice! We have a <1>PAIR</1> of 5s. Time to play.
playableHand.flush: Using the <1>Club Modifier</1> creates a <2>FLUSH</2>! <3/> Let's play it.
playableHand.plays: Click here to see all possible poker hands you can make.

discardCards.title: Discard
discardCards.content: Click the <1>discard button</1> to get new cards.

playCards.title: Play Cards
playCards.content: Hit the <1>play button</1> to use your selected cards.

pointsMultiplier.title: Points & Multiplier
pointsMultiplier.content: Each poker hand has base <1>points</1> and a <2>multiplier</2> that boost your final score.

score.content: Great job! Your last play hit the <1>target score</1>. Time to play for real. <2>Good luck!</2>

specialCards.title: Special Cards
specialCards.content: <1>Special Cards</1> are game-changers with powerful effects. You can buy them in the <2>Store</2>.

modifiers.title: Modifier Cards
modifiers.content: You got a <1>Suit Modifier</1>! <3/> Modifier cards enhance your  <3/> other cards with <2>special effects</2>.
modifiers.drag: Drag the Club modifier onto the 10 card, then click 'Next'.

power-ups.title: Power-ups
power-ups.content: <1>Power-ups</1> give you extra points and multi. They are single-use, but you can buy more in the <2>Store</2>.

coins.title: Coins
coins.content: Well done! You've earned <1>coins</1> for beating the level. Time to spend them in the <1>Store</1>.

levelUpHands.title: Level Up Hands
levelUpHands.content: Upgrade your poker hands to score more <1>points</1> and <1>multipliers</1>.

buyPacks.title: Buy Packs
buyPacks.content: Get <1>packs</1> to boost your deck with rare and special cards at a lower cost.

buyCards.title: Buy Cards
buyCards.content: Buy <1>Traditional</1> and <1>Neon</1> cards here. Neon cards score double points and +1 multi!

modifiers.title: Modifiers
modifiers.content: </1>Modifiers</1> are added to your deck and apply effects to your cards, like adding points or changing suits.

specialCards.title: Special Cards
specialCards.content: </1>Special Cards</1> grant unique global powers that activate immediately. They can turn the tide of the game!

rerollStore.title: Reroll the Store
rerollStore.content: Don't see what you need? Spend <1>coins</1> to reroll the store for a fresh set of items.

nextLevel.title: Next Level
nextLevel.content: Ready for the next challenge? Click here to continue!

specialCards.title: Special Cards
specialCards.content: </1>Special Cards</1> activate right after you buy them and apply their effects after you play a hand.

discardingCards.title: Discarding Special Cards
discardingCards.content: Don't need a <1>Special Card</1>? Click the discard icon on the card to remove it.
discardingCards.content-mobile: Don't need a <1>Special Card</1>? Drag it to the discard button to remove it.

modifierCard.title: Modifier Card
modifierCard.content: <1>Modifier Cards</1> boost or change other cards. Drag a modifier onto a selected card to apply its effect.

discard.title: Discard Modifiers
discard.content: Click the discard icon on the modifier to remove it. This won't cost you a discard.
discard.content-mobile: Drag the modifier to the discard button to remove it. This won't cost you a discard.
